summary.span: 表示控制項，該控制項包含在螢幕上共用相同空間的多個項目。

span.span: Represents a control that contains multiple items that share the same space on the screen.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 很有用，同時允許將大量資料的應用程式將螢幕空間使用量降到最低。The is useful for minimizing screen space usage while allowing an application to expose a large amount of data. A包含多個物件共用相同的螢幕空間。A consists of multiple objects that share the same screen space. 只有一個中會出現在一次。Only one in a is visible at a time. 當使用者選取的索引標籤，該內容變成可見及其他內容會隱藏物件。When a user selects the tab of a , the contents of that become visible and the contents of the other objects are hidden. 是，這表示它可以包含任何類型 （例如字串、 影像或面板） 之物件的集合。 is an , which means it can contain a collection of objects of any type (such as string, image, or panel). 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 類別。For more information, see the class. ## 自訂 TabControl 控制項Customizing the TabControl Control 若要套用至多個相同的屬性設定控制項，可使用屬性。To apply the same property settings to multiple controls, use the property. 您可以修改預設來提供獨特的外觀的控制項。You can modify the default to give the control a unique appearance. 如需有關建立，請參閱[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。For more information about creating a , see [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). 若要查看的組件和所特有狀態，請參閱[TabControl 樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates.md)。To see the parts and states that are specific to the , see [TabControl Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/tabcontrol-styles-and-templates.md). 對這個控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control’s default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值時該控制項會出現在應用程式中。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式是由決定由哪個桌面主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[預設 WPF 佈景主題](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). > [!NOTE] > 設定視覺化屬性只會影響該屬性是否存在於這兩控制項的預設範本，並且使用設定的。Setting a visual property will only have an effect if that property is both present in control's default template and is set by using a . 您可以找到的視覺屬性清單中的 「 變更 Visual 結構的控制項 」 一節中[自訂現有控制項的外觀，藉由建立 ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md)。You can find a list of visual properties in the "Changing the Visual Structure of a Control" section in [Customizing the Appearance of an Existing Control by Creating a ControlTemplate](~/docs/framework/wpf/controls/customizing-the-appearance-of-an-existing-control.md). ## Examples 下列範例會建立並繫結中第二個至在第一個。The following example creates a and binds the in the second to a in the first . [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#16](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#16)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::String ^ ContentStringFormat { System::String ^ get(); void set(System::String ^ value); };

summary.span: 取得複合字串，這個字串會指定如何在 物件顯示為字串時，格式化這些物件的內容。

span.span: Gets a composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the objects if they are displayed as strings.

value.span: 複合字串，指定如何在 物件顯示為字串時，格式化這些物件的內容。

span.span: A composite string that specifies how to format the contents of the objects if they are displayed as strings.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是預先定義、 複合的或自訂字串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 如需字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果您設定或的、屬性會被忽略。If you set the or of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下列範例會繫結集合的`Student`物件。The following example binds a to a collection of `Student` objects. `Student`類別具有`Name`屬性、 集合`Course`物件，並實作方法來傳回`Name`學生或字串，其中列出學生課程。The `Student` class has a `Name` property, a collection of `Course` objects, and implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. 此範例會使用將學生的名稱放入每個(繼承自)，而要顯示的內容中的每一位學生課程清單。The example uses to put a student's name in the of each (which inherits from ), and the to display the course list for each student in the Content of the . [!code-xaml[ContentStringSnippets#TabControl](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#tabcontrol)] 下列範例會實作方法來傳回`Name`學生或字串，其中列出學生課程。The following example implements the method to return either the `Name` of the student or a string that lists the student's courses. [!code-csharp[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#tabcontroltostring)] [!code-vb[ContentStringSnippets#TabControlToString](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentStringSnippets/visualbasic/window1.xaml.vb#tabcontroltostring)]

summary.span: 取得或設定 ，它提供的自訂邏輯適用於選擇用來顯示控制項內容的樣板。

span.span: Gets or sets a that provides custom logic for choosing the template that is used to display the content of the control.
A .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常您會建立有一個以上相同類型的物件，而且您想要提供您自己選擇的邏輯套用根據每個資料物件的屬性。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 請注意，是否您有不同類型的物件，您可以設定屬性。Note that if you have objects of different types, you can set the property on the . 如果您這麼做，則不需要建立。If you do that, then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果您有物件類型相同，但具有不同的屬性時，您也可以考慮使用或資料轉換。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要建立範本選擇器，請建立繼承自類別並覆寫方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 您的類別定義之後，您可以指派給您的項目範本選取器屬性的類別的執行個體。After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. 如果兩個和設定的屬性，則會忽略這個屬性。If both the and the properties are set, then this property is ignored. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項引發藉由呼叫事件。The control raises the event by calling . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[路由傳送事件概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md)。For more information, see [Routed Events Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/routed-events-overview.md).

para.span: 在覆寫在衍生類別中，請務必呼叫基底類別的方法，使已註冊的委派能接收到事件。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class’s method so that registered delegates receive the event.

span.span: Provides data for .

summary.span: 提供 路由事件的類別處理，當使用者按下按鍵時便會發生這個事件。

span.span: Provides class handling for the routed event that occurs when the user presses a key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此實作會將標示事件，如藉由設定處理屬性的事件資料至`true`當使用者按下 CTRL + tab 鍵、 CTRL + SHIFT + TAB，首頁或結束巡覽物件。This implementation marks the event as handled by setting the property of the event data to `true` when the user presses CTRL+TAB, CTRL+SHIFT+TAB, HOME, or END to navigate between objects. 否則，此實作不會變更處理的狀態 (屬性) 的事件資料。Otherwise, this implementation does not change the handled state (the property) of the event data.

para.span: 如果您覆寫，務必呼叫基底實作您實作。

span.span: If you override , always call the base implementation in your implementation.

para.span: 無法呼叫基底實作可防止基底類別處理事件的類別處理常式，可能會變更的最終類別的執行階段行為。

span.span: Failure to call the base implementation prevents base classes from handling the event with a class handler, which might change the run-time behavior of the final class.

para.span: 您可以呼叫之前或之後，在特殊處理的基底實作，根據您的需求。

span.span: You can call the base implementation either before or after your special handling, depending on your requirements.
